snippet.title: Unrivaled Heroes 2 5D Brawler - Official Trailer Pre-Alpha on Steam
snippet.description:
Prepare your 2.5 D beat 'em up side scroller battle for a challenging adventure in medieval aesthetic folklore, where players can learn ancient martial art skills in a progression chapter story to experience the true adrenaline rush from mythical heroes!

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2690830/Unrivaled_Heroes_25D_Brawler/

☆ Amazing Beat 'em up Brawler!
- Intense and strategic combat. Learn enemies behavior and find the chance to strike!
- More playable characters with totally different playstyles
- Fluid Control System! No autoplay! You have full control of everything
- 3 Levels of Difficulty! Beat harder difficulty for even more reward
